tool_description: A list of APIs to provide information about books published since 1900. Information includes Author(s) details, Publisher(s) details and many more.
title: All about Books

api_list.name: Books by Title
api_list.description: Provides books with matching or partially matching title provided to API request.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://all-about-books.p.rapidapi.com/api/v1/book/{title}"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "all-about-books.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())

api_list.name: Books by Publisher Name
api_list.description: Provides list of books published by a Publisher.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://all-about-books.p.rapidapi.com/api/v1/publisher/{name}"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "all-about-books.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())

api_list.name: Books by Year
api_list.description: Provides a list of books published in a year. Data available from 1900 onwards.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://all-about-books.p.rapidapi.com/api/v1/publish/{year}"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "all-about-books.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())

api_list.name: Books by Genre
api_list.description: Provides a list of books from a specific genre
api_list.code:

print(response.json())

api_list.name: Books by Author
api_list.description: Generates one or more books written by an Author provided in API request.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://all-about-books.p.rapidapi.com/api/v1/author/{name}"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "all-about-books.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())
